ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] My day in Kaesora was  Re: MM Drum misadventure and Nostrolo Tamborine
ygData.msgSnippet: ... without every ... Um... That s not flawed. That s a random number generator being... *Gasp* random You should see Nethack and the comments about the RNG
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
>Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 10:21 AM

>I think the failed raider shows how incredibly flawed Verant's
>Random Number Generator is. Many things seem to go for hours (days?)
without every
>triggering; then the RNG goes nuts and pops many many times in a
>row.

Um... That's not flawed. That's a random number generator being...
*Gasp* random

You should see Nethack and the comments about the RNG (it is the main
god of Nethack, the Random Nethack Generator. If you're having a string
of poor games, it is suggested that you sacrifice a few ames to the RNG
to improve your luck. Etc) and how it seems to give and give and give some
games, and then nothing the next.
